definition: to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: But this is as speculative as Fenner's gloomy forecast.
sentences.chinese: 但是，這和芬納悲觀的預測一樣都是推測性的。

sentences.english: Though he had failed, he did not despond.
sentences.chinese: 他雖然失敗了卻沒有悲觀失望。

sentences.english: We now have a pessimistic but not impossible estimate.
sentences.chinese: 我們現在有了一個悲觀但並非不可能的估算。

sentences.english: Some of the commenters are pessimist. Wait and watch.
sentences.chinese: 從評論來看，有些人是悲觀主義者，等着瞧。

sentences.english: This is a reflection of Hemingways stubborn pessimism.
sentences.chinese: 這是海明威式的固執的悲觀主義情結的反映。

sentences.english: Optimists see the flower, while pessimists see the thorns.
sentences.chinese: 樂觀者看見花，而悲觀者看到的刺。

sentences.english: The heat is really up and I truly feel very saddened by the situation, " said Kraisak Choonhavan."
sentences.chinese: 氣氛的確很緊張，我真的對局勢覺得非常悲觀。

sentences.english: There is consider-able pessimism about job opportunity.
sentences.chinese: 人們對就業機會相當悲觀。

sentences.english: Sometime they can be pessimistic which is caused by their dualistic nature.
sentences.chinese: 由於具雙重性格，有時候他們可能會悲觀厭世。

sentences.english: Pessimists give us license to indulge our most misanthropic thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 悲觀主義者給了我們沉浸於厭惡人類的思想中的許可。

sentences.english: I hate to get this pessimistic about the situation. It feels panicky and overwrought.
sentences.chinese: 我不願對局勢如此悲觀，這讓我感到恐慌和過度緊張。

sentences.english: Don't be a prophet of doom. Of course it will be sunny on your wedding day.
sentences.chinese: 不要悲觀，你舉行婚禮那天天當然會放睛的。

sentences.english: In addition, our intermediate-term indicators are currently moderately bearish.
sentences.chinese: 另外，我們的中期指標正在適度地悲觀。

sentences.english: Pessimists fretted that a flood of imports would destroy Indian industry.
sentences.chinese: 悲觀者擔心洪水般的進口會破壞印度的經濟。

sentences.english: Another authority investigates, then strengthened the real estate market to anticipate pessimistically .
sentences.chinese: 另一份權威調查，則更強化了樓市的悲觀預期。

definition: attitude (of the heart)/state of one's psyche/way of thinking/mentality
to despair/to give up all hope/desperate/desperation
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
